wikipedia_page.main: Sir Gregory David Green,  (1948) is a former Chairman of the Dartington Hall Trust and The Prince's School of Traditional Arts. He is a former director-general of the British Council, former Chairman of Royal Commonwealth Society, and former President of the European Union National Institutes for Culture.

response: * G. David Green (born 1948), former chairman of the Dartington Hall Trust and The Prince's School of Traditional Arts
